title: Did Christine Blassie Ford's brother work with a relative?
subtitle: The conspiracy theory claims that they found "three degrees of separation" between the expulsion of FBI agent Peter Starzock and the indictment of Brett Cavanaugh for sexual assault on Christine Blassie Ford.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Christine Blassie Ford ' s brother, Tom Blassey, worked in the same company with a close relative (wife, sister or wife) of former FBI agent Peter Struzk.
